Text:
We process information about your use of services we render and services that are provided by our clients. This information is not personal data ("usage data"). The usage data may include information such as:
 - numbers of users requesting services managed by us and our partners, along with time and duration of visits,
 - numbers of users displaying our advertisements, along with amount of impressions and clicks they generated,
 - data of effectiveness of our advertisements, including categories and profiles, to which users have been assigned to,
 - technical data of users’ web browsers and operating systems,
 - regional settings and approximate location,
 - anonymized IP addresses.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We process information about your use of services we render and services that are provided by our clients. This information is not personal data ("usage data"). The usage data may include information such as:
 - numbers of users requesting services managed by us and our partners, along with time and duration of visits,
 - numbers of users displaying our advertisements, along with amount of impressions and clicks they generated,
 - data of effectiveness of our advertisements, including categories and profiles, to which users have been assigned to,
 - technical data of users’ web browsers and operating systems,
 - regional settings and approximate location,
 - anonymized IP addresses.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: This usage data may be processed by us and our Partners indicated in section II.13 below for the purposes of analyzing the use of the services and, optionally, linking devices, selecting basic ads, creating a personalised ads profile and selecting personalised ads (ad targeting), measuring ads performance, applying market research to generate audience insights (users’ modelling), developing and improving products (R&D) based on user’s consent as well as technically delivering ads based on our legitimate interests, namely advertising services of ours or of our clients’. Additionally, we may process data in order to ensure security, prevent fraud and debug when necessary, which also constitutes our legitimate interest.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We collect usage data in order to increase the relevancy of the ads being displayed to you i.e. advertisements of products they may be likely interested it, and other advertising-related purposes.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: The usage data we collect is also used for reporting purposes, to give our clients and partners more information about the performance of their advertising campaigns, and to improve performance over time.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We do not collect, use and process any personal data, including personal data of users such as name, gender, age, address, place of residence, personal identification numbers, phone numbers, e-mail etc. Also, we do not receive any additional data from our partners, which, along with data collected by our technology, would enable us to directly identify you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We do not collect, use and process sensitive data (such as data about political opinion, religion, health etc.).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: The usage data do not directly identify an individual and is not considered to be personal information, however specific types of the information such as non-anonymized IP address or cookies file, may be considered personal information in EU/EEA or if combined with other information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

16. Notwithstanding any other provision, we partner with third parties that collect information across various channels, including offline and online, for purposes of delivering more relevant advertising to you or your business. Our partners may place or recognize a cookie on your computer, device, and we may share personal information with them if you have submitted such information about your device ID. Our partners may link the hashed or obfuscated personal information we share with them to the cookie stored on your browser or device, and they may collect information such as your browser or operating system type and version, and demographic or inferred-interest information. Our partners use this information to recognize you across different channels and platforms, including but not limited to, computers, mobile devices, over time for advertising (including addressable TV), analytics, attribution, and reporting purposes. For example, our partners may deliver an ad to you in your web browser based on a purchase you made in a physical retail store or based on the fact that you visited a particular website. Your data may be transferred outside of the country from which it was originally collected. To learn more about interest-based advertising in general and to opt-out, please visit http://www.aboutads.info/choices. To opt-out of the use of your mobile device ID for targeted advertising, please see http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices.
\n \n§ III. Cookies and other technical means
We are storing on users’ computer systems telephone or other device from which you access cookie files (small text files) containing anonymous identifier (alphanumerical).
We are also using other technical means necessary to provide its advertising services, such as tracking pixels (accessing cookie files) and mobile identifiers.
Cookie files:
collect data regarding your use of the website, and their main purpose is to facilitate the use of the website and customize the website to your needs and expectations;
are placed on the user’s end device and may also be placed on behalf advertisers and partners cooperating with us;
do not store information constituting personal data of the user;
are not used to determine the identity of the user;
are used on the website, based on the acceptance of recommended settings of the website user expressed through appropriate software settings, in particular through a web browser.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Collected and processed data
In this section we have set out:
 - the general categories of data that we process;
 - the source and specific categories of data;
 - the purposes for which we process data for;
 - the legal bases of the processing.
We process information about your use of services we render and services that are provided by our clients. This information is not personal data ("usage data"). The usage data may include information such as:
 - numbers of users requesting services managed by us and our partners, along with time and duration of visits,
 - numbers of users displaying our advertisements, along with amount of impressions and clicks they generated,
 - data of effectiveness of our advertisements, including categories and profiles, to which users have been assigned to,
 - technical data of users’ web browsers and operating systems,
 - regional settings and approximate location,
 - anonymized IP addresses.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We may share the data collected within the capital group including Cloud Technologies S.A., Online Advertising Network sp. z o.o, Audience Network sp. z o.o.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We may share the data collected within the capital group including Cloud Technologies S.A., Online Advertising Network sp. z o.o, Audience Network sp. z o.o.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Notwithstanding any other provision, we partner with third parties that collect information across various channels, including offline and online, for purposes of delivering more relevant advertising to you or your business. Our partners may place or recognize a cookie on your computer, device, and we may share personal information with them if you have submitted such information about your device ID.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: To learn more about interest-based advertising in general and to opt-out, please visit http://www.aboutads.info/choices. To opt-out of the use of your mobile device ID for targeted advertising, please see http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices.
Label: Methods to exercise rights
Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: You may at any time revoke or change the scope of any previously expressed consent to use cookie files on the website and delete them from your browser.\nYou may also at any time limit or disable cookie files in your browser through the settings.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: We will retain cookie files for a maximum period of 12 months. Please refer to our partners’ privacy policies for more information on our partners’ retention period.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We use the following types of cookies:\nID cookies: these are cookies that remember an anonymous identifier that we have assigned to you\nTechnical cookies: these are cookies that are saved when our partner is allowed to set their own cookie on our coverage.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: You may prevent data collection, processing and transmission to third parties by clicking the link: https://www.onaudience.com/opt-out.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Downloading an opt-out cookie is equivalent to using “Do not sell my personal data” functionality as required by the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act).
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: You may also disable cookies and local storage in its web browser.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: You are entitled to:\nthe right to access your data and receive a copy thereof, i.e. obtain information whether we process your personal data and specific information about such processing;
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: the right to rectify (amend) their data, i.e. request to amend inaccurate personal data;
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: the right to delete data, restrict the processing of data, provided that one of relevant ground for such action apply;
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: the right to object to data processing;
Label: Others

Text: the right to object to data processing;\n
Label: Others

Text: the right to data transfer, i.e. receive data you provided us with in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format and if necessary to request transmitting those data to another controller;
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: the right to complain to a supervisory authority;\nand the right to withdraw consent.
Label: Others

Text: You may exercise any of your rights in relation to your personal data by written or e-mail notice to us as indicated in Section 1.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
Retaining and deleting personal data
This Section sets out our data retention policies and procedure, which are designed to help ensure that we comply with our legal obligations in relation to the retention and deletion of data.
If we are the data processor of your personal data that we process in accordance with the data controller’s instructions such data shall not be kept for longer than specified by the data controller.
If we are the data processor of your personal data we will retain your personal data for a minimum period of 12 months following your subscription.
Notwithstanding the other provisions of this section, we may retain your personal data where such retention is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation.
Usage data are not personal data and may be stored up to 24 months.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Amendments\nWe may update this policy from time to time by publishing a latest version on our website. A new policy enters into force immediately after its publication on the website.\nWe will inform you of any such changes via email notification or notification on our website.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy
